feed.title: MSFS Blog
feed.subtitle: Development updates of Microsoft Flight Simulator.

entry.title: Peripheral Spotlight: Pimax
entry.summary: We have an incredible, dedicated VR fanbase in our community, and we know how important the right headset is when flying! Today we are pleased to highlight Pimax, a technology company that specializes in virtual reality hardware products. Their Pimax Crystal Light is a great PCVR headset for flight simmers who crave stunning clarity to … Continued

entry.title: Peripheral Spotlight: Turtle Beach
entry.summary: For day two of our Peripheral Spotlight series we’re featuring Turtle Beach! With a plethora of hardware products ranging from headsets, to keyboards, and of course flight simulation, Turtle Beach is one of the leading brands in the whole of the gaming industry for both Console and PC.In 2019, on a routine visit to Microsoft, … Continued

entry.title: Peripheral Spotlight: Tobii
entry.summary: We are thrilled to shine a light on Tobii, most known in the flight simulation community for the Tobii Eye Tracker 5. If you attended the past two FlightSimExpos (Houston or Las Vegas), you may have had the chance to try it out at our booth!Tobii Eye Tracker 5 translates your eye and head movements, … Continued

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024: Preview Round Up
entry.summary: Earlier in September a collection of community content creators and press representatives were given a hands-on early preview of Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024. Stay tuned to this page where we’ll be highlighting some of their impressions and thoughts.

entry.title: September 26th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: This week’s Screenshot Challenge winner is Forum user KnackBretzel! If you’re interested in participating in our weekly Screenshot Challenges, check out the details in the Community section below!It’s been another big week for Microsoft Flight Simulator news!Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 is now available to pre-order on Steam! With pre-orders for Xbox and Windows Store going live … Continued

entry.title: Join us for the Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 Technical Alpha in October
entry.summary: In October we’re hosting a technical alpha to gather feedback on some of Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024’s new services. Please note the focus of this technical alpha is validating new services in Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, and the scope of available content will be limited. Because the focus of this technical alpha is services, it … Continued

entry.title: October 17th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: This week’s Screenshot Challenge winner is Forum user HolmesCZ6127! If you’re interested in participating in our weekly Screenshot Challenges, check out the details in the Community section below!From October 11-14, we ran the Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 Technical Alpha Test.
